org.opendaylight.controller.networkconfig.neutron

Interface INeutronNetworkAware


  • public interface INeutronNetworkAware
    This interface defines the methods a service that wishes to be aware of Neutron Networks needs to implement

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int canCreateNetwork(NeutronNetwork network)
      Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified network can be created
      int canDeleteNetwork(NeutronNetwork network)
      Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified network can be deleted
      int canUpdateNetwork(NeutronNetwork delta, NeutronNetwork original)
      Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified network can be changed using the specified delta
      void neutronNetworkCreated(NeutronNetwork network)
      Services provide this interface method for taking action after a network has been created
      void neutronNetworkDeleted(NeutronNetwork network)
      Services provide this interface method for taking action after a network has been deleted
      void neutronNetworkUpdated(NeutronNetwork network)
      Services provide this interface method for taking action after a network has been updated

    • Method Detail

      • canCreateNetwork

        int canCreateNetwork(NeutronNetwork network)
        Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified network can be created
        Parameters:
        network - instance of proposed new Neutron Network object
        Returns:
        integer the return value is understood to be a HTTP status code. A return value outside of 200 through 299 results in the create operation being interrupted and the returned status value reflected in the HTTP response.

      • neutronNetworkCreated

        void neutronNetworkCreated(NeutronNetwork network)
        Services provide this interface method for taking action after a network has been created
        Parameters:
        network - instance of new Neutron Network object

      • canUpdateNetwork

        int canUpdateNetwork(NeutronNetwork delta,
                   NeutronNetwork original)
        Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified network can be changed using the specified delta
        Parameters:
        delta - updates to the network object using patch semantics
        network - instance of the Neutron Network object to be updated
        Returns:
        integer the return value is understood to be a HTTP status code. A return value outside of 200 through 299 results in the update operation being interrupted and the returned status value reflected in the HTTP response.

      • neutronNetworkUpdated

        void neutronNetworkUpdated(NeutronNetwork network)
        Services provide this interface method for taking action after a network has been updated
        Parameters:
        network - instance of modified Neutron Network object

      • canDeleteNetwork

        int canDeleteNetwork(NeutronNetwork network)
        Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified network can be deleted
        Parameters:
        network - instance of the Neutron Network object to be deleted
        Returns:
        integer the return value is understood to be a HTTP status code. A return value outside of 200 through 299 results in the delete operation being interrupted and the returned status value reflected in the HTTP response.

      • neutronNetworkDeleted

        void neutronNetworkDeleted(NeutronNetwork network)
        Services provide this interface method for taking action after a network has been deleted
        Parameters:
        network - instance of deleted Neutron Network object
